original_text: Joshua also made a heap of 12 stones in the middle of the Jordan River. He put them in the place where the priests with the Covenant Box had stood. Those stones are still there today.
korean_text: 여호수아가 또 요단 가운데 곧 언약궤를 멘 제사장들의 발이 선 곳에 돌 열둘을 세웠더니 오늘까지 거기에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Joshua also made a heap of 12 stones
in the middle of the Jordan River
He put them in the place
where the priests with the Covenant Box had stood
sentences.korean_translation: 언약 궤를 가진 제사장들이 서 있었던

sentences.original_text: Those stones are still there today
sentences.korean_translation: 그 돌들은 오늘날까지 여전히 그곳에 있습니다
